entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 40%
